jobs.description:
Make Market Research and do business analysis.
• Develop new business opportunities.
• Evaluate and Help business development department to investigate the economic conditions of business activity such as industry trends and competition.
• Identify, Develop and evaluate Marketing strategy, based on knowledge of establishment objectives, market characteristics and cost.
• Evaluate the financial aspects of Product development, such as budget, expenditure, and return on investment.
• Consult with buying personnel to gain advice regarding the types of Products or services expected to be in demand.
• Handling Commercials, Technical and Regulatory queries from clients.
• Handling the orders from the initiation to the execution of the order placed.
• Consult with Drug Regulatory Authorities on dossier submission.
• Use Sales forecast and Strategic Planning to ensure the sale and Profitability of Products, analyzing Business Developments and Monitoring Market trends.
• Balancing firm objectives, customer satisfaction and Relations.
• Handling Export Documentation and and Incoterms whole matters.
• Preparing Quotation, Sales contract
• Correspondence & Co-ordination with Factory, Logistic Dept., and Overseas Clients regarding the documentation and consignment.
• Maintaining records (Documents related to shipments, payment records)
• Web Research for the global Pharmaceutical organization using Iodine derivatives companies where we can sell our products.
• E-mail Marketing and follow-ups.
• Any other work as assigned.

•	Business Development Activity for Foreign Exchange Business, Loans (Gold, Vehicle & Personal), Travel and Tour Business.
•	To Develop Corporate Business through Meeting and Corporate Tie Up for Foreign Exchange and Travels.
•	To Develop Agency Business through meeting Education Consultancy.
•	Catering Client need of Money transfer through SWIFT methodology and abiding by the Rules and Regulation of RBI.
•	 TO develop collections of database for branch sales. Undertake welcome calling for HNI clients.
•	To meet & exceed all service & process related parameters as laid down by the Organization. 
•	To diligently ensure implementation of all internal & external guidelines/process notes for the Teller functions & branch operations. 
•	To play the role of a guide & mentor to reporting personnel with respect to Sales / Service & Operational efficiency.

	 Manage staff with responsibility for overall office Management. 
	Responsible for all financial and administrative functions insurance/risk management, banking relationships, contracts and legal documents, benefit plan compliance and profitability improvements. 
	 Responsible for Customer service and daily record keeping, Provide personal service to clients. 
	Developing & Generating MIS Reports Periodically. 
	 Set Up and manage daily field cash monitoring and reporting. 
	Reporting for monthly field enrollments cash and expenses details. 
	Fully fledged responsibility of district field cash monitoring and reporting.
	 Monitoring financial transaction, Coordination with Regional Accounts team.

	Identifying New to Bank Customers for Bank’s Products by making Customer Calls and Customer Visits.
	Completing Account Opening Formalities.
	Handling Customer Service Requests and resolve them within 24 Hrs.
	Pitching third party Products to existing and new Clients.

I am born & brought up in Ahmedabad. I post graduated in HR in 2015. As a person, I am energetic & fun loving, who sees life as a challenge and love challenges. I have a positive attitude in every task given to me, one who never thinks about results but work efficiently and dedicatedly towards the goal because according to me, thinking about results wastes your present and working smartly and efficiently results in better future.

My Objectives in life are to live a happy life positively and to create a better future. For me, no dream, no objective and no goal is too big to achieve, what matters is how you see it and work towards it.
